name: currentsong
title: CurrentSong
author: Paco Hobi
description: Writes the current playing song from popular music sites to a text file and a XML file
author: Paco Hobi

preferences.name: saveFolder
preferences.title: Folder
preferences.description: Folder in which the song info will be saved

preferences.name: infoFormat
preferences.title: Format
preferences.description:
Format of the saved song information:
	%song% will be replaced by the song name
	%artist% will be replaced by the artist name
	%album% will be replaced by the album name
	%line% will be replaced by a new line

preferences.name: saveArtwork
preferences.title: Save artwork
preferences.description: If enabled the song artwork will be downloaded to 'song.jpg' (when available)

preferences.name: interval
preferences.title: Interval
preferences.description: Time in seconds to wait between new song checks

preferences.name: notify
preferences.title: Notifications
preferences.description: If enabled a notification will be shown when a new song starts (not compatible with all systems)

preferences.name: parseTrack
preferences.title: Parse title
preferences.description:
If enabled will try to extract the artist name of the current title. Only applied to SoundCloud and YouTube.
• This will only work correctly if the track title is in the format 'artist - song'
• If the track title contains ' - ' but isn't in the correct format, the song and artist will be parsed incorrectly
